select *,fee/100 as feeformat from withdrawday where openid=#{openid} ORDER BY time DESC limit #{page},#{pagenum}
select count(*) from withdrawday where openid=#{openid}
select count(*) from withdrawday where openid=#{openid} and storeid=#{storeid}
